answers.answer: It's not benefitting your baby, it's also putting you at higher risk for gestational diabetes, high blood pressure and c section.

I realize if you don't buy the junk food and have them around you do much better with your eating habits. I buy almonds, cheese stick, and unsalted nuts to snack on with my fruits. Just try to eat better I know it's hard, but your baby and your body will reap the benefit. Good luck.

I've been eating whatever my heart desires since I've been pregnant, I eat healthy when I can but for the most part if I feel like eating pizza I'll eat pizza! I'm 29 weeks have only gained 15 lbs my son is completely healthy weighs 2.9 pounds and my starting weight was 125lbs! I mean everyone is different and everyone's body is as well.

question: 19 weeks and I've been eating like poop for the last 2 week. I do put in fruits and veggies everyday but it seems like the junk food over powers the healthy food.Is this hurting my baby ?
title: I can't stop eating !!
